title: Delta Aces LFM For OCE Open ladder Tournaments
body:
Hi all! Im putting together a team for multiple Tournaments over the coming days, and for climbing the ladder into the year! All ranks may apply.

Please List the following:

Age:
Preferred Role:
Champs for said Role:
Rank:


We may use Skype but curse preferred.

I will be taking the support role.

I'm looking for people who can work well together, and help each other improve.

Thanks for taking the time to read! 

-BreakableMALS

replies.body:
Age: 17

Preferred Role: Support

Champs for said Role:
-Thresh
-Nami
-leo
-braum
-lulu
-janna
-morg

Rank: Gold 5

Age: 19
Preferred Role: Mid, ADC
Champs for said role: Mid (Fizz/Syndra/Ahri/Kat/Diana/Ori) ADC (Lucian/Kalista/Draven/Sivir/Corki)
Rank: Plat V

Available weekdays 6pm-late and Sat-Sun all day. Looking for a team that's going to work together and improve over time, not people looking for instant glory.
Msg me in-game: Plottel

Age: 15
Preferred Role: ADC,MID
Champs for said Role: cass vayne cait 
Rank: gold 2

Age: 16
Preferred Role: AD, but will play anywhere you want me to.
Champs for said Role: I can play all AD's but Draven, but I prefer Lucian/Corki a lot at the moment. For other roles I can play a deep range of champions.
Rank: Silver V. (Worth trying me at least.)

I just got back from holidays and I'm trying to play for a substantial amount of hours per day to improve myself as a player so I can fit in a competitive team.

Age: 20
Preferred Role: Any
Champs for said Role: Can diverse and play matter champs
Rank: gold 4

my major issue is im available nz time from 8am to 1pm and 11.30 pm to 4 am
